activities.name: Copy data from github to adls

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from tbluser
Where Last_m <= '05/01/2021' And   Last_m >  '03/01/2021'

Select max([Last_m]) as Last_m
from tbluser

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from tbluser
where Last_m<=
'@{activity('Get max modified date').output.firstRow.Last_m}'
and Last_m >
'@{activity('Get last updated date').output.firstRow.LastLoadDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select table_schema,table_name
from information_schema.tables
where table_type = 'base table'  and table_schema = 'HumanResources'

select LastLoadDate as Last_Load_Date
from tblcontrol

select max(Last_m) as last_m
from tbluser

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from tbluser
where last_m <= 
@'{activity('Get max updated date').output}'
and last_m >
@'{activity('Last updated date').output}'
